Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (12,-48,64).
maple: spec := [S,{B=Set(Z),S=Prod(Z,Z,B,B,B,B)},labeled]: seq(combstruct[count](spec,size=n), n=0..20);seq(n*(n-1)*4^(n-2), n=0..20); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 25 2007
